Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 剣匠
Entry.EnglishText: Swordsmith

Entry.JapaneseText: 剣匠の弟
Entry.EnglishText: Swordsmith's Younger Brother

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の作った武器が、 セレーナを取り戻す助けになれば……
Entry.EnglishText: It would be great if Selena was saved with the weapons I've made...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>…… がんばってこいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Do your best out there, okay, <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の作る剣を買ってくれないか？ 武器屋に置いてあるんだが。
Entry.EnglishText: Why don't you buy some of my swords? They sell them over at the weapon shop.

Entry.JapaneseText: きっと旅するうえで、 あんたらの大きな支えに なってくれるぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure you could make use of one on your journey.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、工場のヤツら、 セレーナがいなくて、 みんなやる気力がなかったんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone at the factory was upset after Selena was kidnapped.

Entry.JapaneseText: これで工場に活気が 戻るってもんだ。 がんばったな、<Tytree>！
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone is feeling much better now that she's back. Great work, <Tytree>!

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカで女王様の お披露目の儀式が あるんだってな。
Entry.EnglishText: I hear that there's going to be an inauguration ceremony for the Queen over in Balka.

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナをさらったのも その女王様直属の部隊だって 言うじゃないか。
Entry.EnglishText: Weren't the ones who kidnapped Selena from a unit under the direct control of the Queen?

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、何がどうなってるんだ？ さっぱりわからんな。
Entry.EnglishText: Why on earth would she have them do such a thing? It makes zero sense to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの連中は 俺らヒューマが見張ってないと なまけやがるからな……
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajuma aren't going to get anything without us Huma supervising them...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、しっかり見張れよ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...So you need to get to work!

Entry.JapaneseText: 街が妙な雰囲気だと思わないか？ 前とは違うというか……
Entry.EnglishText: Do you feel like this town has changed any...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺はこうして毎日、 かまどに向かって剣を作ってるから よくわからなかったが……
Entry.EnglishText: I hadn't really noticed because I spend almost every day here in front of my forge...

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと出かけたら 変な雰囲気なんだよな……
Entry.EnglishText: But whenever I step outside for a bit, things feel off...

Entry.JapaneseText: 剣はヒトの心を映す鏡だ。 使う者の心が表れる。
Entry.EnglishText: Swords are mirrors that reflect the Human heart and reveal the character of their wielder.

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪意を持って使えば、 その剣は曇って後に使う者を 邪の道に引きずり込むんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: If used for evil, the sword will grow cloudy and drag those that use it after down the path of evil.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の作った剣には そうなってほしくないなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope my swords won't be used in such a way...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが工場に押し寄せて、 大変らしいが、 俺はこの剣作りのための かまどさえあればいいのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that the recent influx of Gajuma over at the factory is causing problems, but all I need is my furnace here to make swords.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……俺以上の剣匠が現れたら、 ちょいと困るがな……
Entry.EnglishText: Now if some other swordsmith were to show up, I'd have more of a problem...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマだ、ヒューマだ、 街の外でも中でも 少しもめてるらしいけど、 俺には関係ないね。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that relations between Gajuma and Huma have been rocky both here and in other towns, but I don't really care.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺にはこの剣作りにかける 情熱さえあれば、 周りで何が起こってようとも……
Entry.EnglishText: As long as I have the passion to make these swords, nothing else matters.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ？ 俺の作った剣に 文句があるのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What? Are you having problems with the swords I make?

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、使うな!!
Entry.EnglishText: Then don't use them!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが俺の作った剣に ケチをつけるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma are complaining about the swords I make.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの作ったもの なんか大した事ないってな。
Entry.EnglishText: Saying things like "Huma-made swords aren't anything special."

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当にあの連中、 俺の剣作りに嫉妬してるのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I bet they're just jealous of my swordsmithing skills.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマにはもう金輪際 剣は作ってやらない！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll never make swords for you Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 帰った、帰った！
Entry.EnglishText: Now LEAVE!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの連中、 俺の作った剣を折りやがった……！
Entry.EnglishText: Those damn Gajuma are breaking my swords...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の目の前で、意図的にさ。 ヒドイと思わないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Right in front of me, even. Isn't that deplorable?

Entry.JapaneseText: もう金輪際あいつらのためには 剣は作らない!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm never making them weapons ever again!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺の作った武器を粗末に 扱わないなら…… あんたも俺の剣、使っていいぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you don't mistreat the weapons that I've made, then I'll allow you to use them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマたちのやった事は許せない…… でも罪を憎んでヒトを憎まず、 って言うだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: I'll never get over what those Gajuma did, but as they say, "Hate the sin, love the sinner"

Entry.JapaneseText: いやな……俺の剣を折った ガジュマの連中が 謝りに来てくれてな……
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajuma who broke the swords I made came here to apologize...

Entry.JapaneseText: 変に目くじら立てても、 なんかかっこ悪いなと思ってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Would've been petty if I made a big deal out of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>の仲間だろうと、 なんだろうと、ガジュマは帰れ！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care if you're <Tytree>'s friend or whatever, LEAVE!

Entry.JapaneseText: 根性の曲がったガジュマなんかと 旅してるとおまえの根性も曲がるぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Travelling with Gajuma is just gonna make you as twisted as they are!

Entry.JapaneseText: さっさと 帰ってこい！
Entry.EnglishText: LEAVE!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと一緒に旅してる ヒューマにも剣は作りたくないな。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't want you using my swords if you're travelling with a Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたらに恨みはないが、 そういう事だ。 帰った帰った。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't really hate you guys, but that's just how it is. Now go somewhere else.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんだよ、これ…… 家全体がびりびり言ってるぞ？
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-what the hell...? The whole house is shaking?

Entry.JapaneseText: 弟はセレーナに熱を上げてるが、 俺は剣作りさえあれば、 愛なんていらん！
Entry.EnglishText: My little brother's head over heels for Selena, but I have no need for love as long as I'm making swords!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺は、このかまどが恋人だ！
Entry.EnglishText: This forge is my girlfriend!

Entry.JapaneseText: 弟の奴、セレーナに 熱を上げてるみたいだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently my little brother has a crush on Selena.

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬鹿だな、<Tytree>の前で セレーナの事を言ったら、 うまくいくもんもダメになるに 決まってるのに……
Entry.EnglishText: What a dumbass. Things aren't gonna go well for him if he talks about her in front of <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺みたいに……いやいや…… ……忘れてくれよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I tried that once and... Ah, nevermind...

Entry.JapaneseText: 弟は俺の事を 剣作りの名人だっていうけど、 まだまだ修行が足りないな。
Entry.EnglishText: My brother calls me an expert in swordsmithing, but I've still got a long ways to go.

Entry.JapaneseText: 店で売ってる剣使ったら 感想、聞かせてくれよな。
Entry.EnglishText: If you buy one of my swords, let me know what you think about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree> 俺たちでセレーナを 助けに行ければいいんだが……
Entry.EnglishText: We'd come with you to save Selena, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 正直、俺の剣の腕で、 セレーナを取り戻せるか……
Entry.EnglishText: To be honest, saving her with my sword skills is... yeah...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちって、剣作るのは得意だけど、 使うのはそれほどでもないからさ……
Entry.EnglishText: We're good at making swords, but that's just about it...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は 本当に姉貴っ子だからな……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>'s way too obsessed with his sister...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……セレーナ…… 無事でいてくれれば いいけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope Selena is unharmed, at the very least...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、 セレーナの事は 俺が守るから心配すんな。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you worry about your sister, <Tytree>. I'll protect her.

Entry.JapaneseText: 相変わらずだな…… いいかげん独り立ちしろよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I see you haven't changed a bit... You need to learn how to live your own life.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は、セレーナにべったりで、 俺たちとは、話すらさせてくれないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>'s so obsessed with his sister that he won't let any other guy talk to her.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも……<Tytree>が 旅に出てる今がチャンスさ。 今のうちに……
Entry.EnglishText: But now that he's travelling with you guys... I might just get an opportunity to do so...

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……<Tytree>には 秘密だからな。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, uhh... Keep that a secret from him, alright?

Entry.JapaneseText: よう、<Tytree>、 巡回に行かなくていいのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Yo, <Tytree>, aren't you supposed to be on patrol?

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナさんが 待ってるんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Your sister's waiting, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: 近頃、疑問に思う事がふたつあるんだ。 ヒトはどうしてガジュマとヒューマに 分かれているんだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: There are two things that have been on my mind lately... Why is Mankind divided between Huma and Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: もうひとつは なんでこの世のヒトは 男と女に分かれてるんだろうって事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: And why are they also divided into men and women?

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナ……はあ…… 切ないな……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, Selena... How I long for you...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>…… いいかげん姉ばなれしてくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, give it up already, would you?

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてこの世にガジュマが いるのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Why do Gajuma exist?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたは…… どうしてヒューマがいるか、 考えた事はあるか？
Entry.EnglishText: Though I take it you might be wondering why Huma exist.

Entry.JapaneseText: 近頃、疑問に思う事がふたつあるんだ。 なんでこの世のヒトは 男と女に分かれてるんだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: There are two things that have been on my mind lately... Why is Mankind divided into men and women?

Entry.JapaneseText: もうひとつは どうしてガジュマとヒューマに 分かれているんだろうって事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: And why is it also divided into Huma and Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: 前者は……まあ、ともかく 後者はどれだけ考えても よくわからない……
Entry.EnglishText: For the former, uh... Anyway, for the latter, I can't really think of a good answer.

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場にガジュマが増えて、 ずいぶんセレーナも 苦労してるみたいだぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Selena must be having a hard time with all those new Gajuma workers at the factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺も兄貴の手伝いがなければ、 すぐにでも工場へ行ってやるのにな……
Entry.EnglishText: If I wasn't helping my brother, I'd go over there and help her...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ、俺がセレーナの相手じゃ 役者不足だってか？
Entry.EnglishText: What? You think I'm not good enough to be with her?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……すまん…… 最近、ガジュマの顔を見ると……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, sorry... It's just lately when I see a Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場のガジュマが増えて、 色々大変だと聞いたせいか……
Entry.EnglishText: It's just that I heard the factory has been having a lot more problems ever since more Gajuma started working there.

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、あんたら、 連れのガジュマに 腹立つ事はないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, does your Gajuma companion ever piss you off?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺なんか……最近…… 腹の立つ事が多くてさ……
Entry.EnglishText: Because lately... I've been getting pissed off a lot...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを見ると 嫌悪感と拒否感を感じるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever I see Gajuma, I feel repulsed and don't want to be around them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今までこの街にガジュマが 少なかったせいかな。
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe it's because there used to not be so many of them here?

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街を旅してみて、 おまえも同じように感じたんじゃないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Have you been feeling the same thing as you've been travelling around to different towns?

Entry.JapaneseText: うっ…… あっち行ってくれ…… あっち行けっ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh... Please go somewhere else.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの顔を見ると、 吐き気を覚えるんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma make me want to hurl...

Entry.JapaneseText: 生理的なものだから どうしようもないんだ…… あっち行ってくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't control my physical responses, so... Please just go away...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでこの国の王様は ガジュマなんだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder why our country's ruler is a Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度くらいヒューマがなっても いいんじゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Like, wouldn't it be better if we had a Huma ruler?

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスでアガーテ女王が 処刑されていれば…… なんて考える俺は不謹慎なのか？
Entry.EnglishText: If only Queen Agarte got executed in Belsas... I guess that's not really an appropriate train of thought...

Entry.JapaneseText: かわいい女の子が 工場で騒ぎを起こしたんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that a cute girl caused a disturbance at the factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでも、偉そうな態度の 女の子だったってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently she was being really bossy.

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナから 何か聞いてないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Has Selena told you about it yet?
Entry.Notes: Did Selena give you the details?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ガジュマ…… ……だ、ダメだ…… あっち行ってくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: I really can't stand being around Gajuma... Please go somewhere else...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場の連中はガジュマを 誤解してたって言ってたけど……
Entry.EnglishText: The factory workers said that they misunderstood the Gajuma, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ俺はガジュマに 抵抗感があるな……
Entry.EnglishText: I still have reservations towards the Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 慣れなきゃいけないのかなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe I just need to get used to them...?

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな、<Tytree>の帰りを 待ってるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone's waiting for you to come back, <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: もうおまえがいなきゃ、 この街は前みたいに戻れない……
Entry.EnglishText: This town just isn't the same without you around...

Entry.JapaneseText: あっち行ってくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: Please... leave...

Entry.JapaneseText: 前みたいにガジュマに 吐き気を覚える事はなくなったけど、 拒否感だけは残ったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't feel as sick as I used to when in the presence of Gajuma, but my feelings of apprehension are still there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマは粗暴だし、 ワガママ言い放題だから…… 工場の連中がぼやいてたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I overheard some guys from the factory talking about how rude and selfish Gajuma are.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり受けつけがたい 存在だよな。
Entry.EnglishText: I still can't bring myself to accept them.

Entry.JapaneseText: すごい音がしてるけど…… 大丈夫なのか……!?
Entry.EnglishText: This noise is so loud... I wonder what's going on...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Tytree>が一人前になるまでは 誰とも結婚する気分にはなれないって セレーナに言われたよ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Selena told me that she's not getting married until you can support yourself...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえ、もう帰ってこなくていいや。
Entry.EnglishText: So maybe you can just not come back.

Entry.JapaneseText: 冗談だってば。 怒るなよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Just kidding. Don't take it so personally...

Entry.JapaneseText: こ、こんにちは……！
Entry.EnglishText: H-Hello!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……よし…… 挨拶はできた、と……
Entry.EnglishText: Nice...! I managed to say hello...

Entry.JapaneseText: 少しずつガジュマに対する 抵抗感をなくして、 慣れていくようにしようと思ってるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm trying to get over my revulsion towards Gajuma so I can get used to being around them.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、まだ少し ぎこちないか……？
Entry.EnglishText: But I guess I still feel iffy around them...?

Entry.JapaneseText: うちの兄貴は剣匠なんだ。 武器屋に行けば、 兄貴の作った剣が買えるぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: My older brother's a swordsmith! If you head over to the weapons shop, you can buy some of his handiwork!

Entry.JapaneseText: ちなみに剣匠ってのは、 剣作りの名人の事さ。
Entry.EnglishText: He's an expert at what he does!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText:
<speed:0>『予定表』 「今月の予定
ディフェンダー ４本 フルーリー ６本 武器屋 切磋琢磨様
チェインアーマー チェインメイル チェインプレート ６枚 防具屋 質実剛健様」
Entry.EnglishText:
<speed:0> - Itinerary - "This month's plans:
Defender - 4 Units Fleury - 6 Units For the Weapon Shop: Discipline
Chain Armor Chainmail Chain Plate - 6 each For the Armor Shop: Sincerity"

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『試作品の棚』 試作品の剣や防具などが ところ狭しと置かれている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Shelf of Prototypes - Prototype swords and armor are stored on this narrow shelf.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『大きな樽』 張り紙がしてある。 「危険、触るな」
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0> - Large Barrel - "DANGER DON'T TOUCH" Is boldly written on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: コワいな…… 何が入ってるの……？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm scared... I wonder what's inside...

Entry.JapaneseText: 触るくらい、いいよな……
Entry.EnglishText: Just a little touch should be fine, right...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 触るなよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: KEEP YOUR HANDS OFF THAT!

Entry.JapaneseText: 触るなよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: KEEP YOUR HANDS OFF THAT!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『木箱』 窯の燃料のようなものが 入っている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0> - Wooden Crate - There's fuel for the stove in it.
